resources.string: Cold War Barracks
Full-auto assault rifle. High damage with a marginally slower fire rate. Excellent stopping power for mid to short range encounters.
Full-auto assault rifle. Improved damage and accuracy. Excellent weapon control and visibility when sustaining fire.
Full-auto assault rifle. Reliable damage with improved fire rate. Fair weapon control when sustaining fire.
Full-auto assault rifle. Superiror mobility with improved handling speeds. Erratic initial recoil with less accurate hipfire spread.
Full-auto submachine gun. Improved damage with reliable weapon control. Utilizes 5.56mm ammo for superior penetration.
Full-auto submachine gun. High damage with a slower fire rate and fair recoil. Improved handling speeds with more accurate hipfire spread.
Full-auto submachine gun. Fast fire rate with low recoil. Good visibility and control while firing.
3-round burst submachine gun. High damage with moderate range. Burst fire spread is less efficient at long range.
Burst fire tactical rifle. Excellent burst fire accuracy when aiming down sights. Good visibility while firing, with a slightly pronounced delay between bursts.
Semi-auto tactical rifle. High damage and reliable accuracy with lower ammo capacity. Fair visibility and control while firing.
Full-auto light machine gun. Improved handling speeds with more accurate hipfire spread. Less ammo capacity and heavier recoil when sustaining fire.
Full-auto light machine gun. Improved fire rate with a large ammo capacity. Good recoil control and visibility when sustaining fire.
Bolt-action sniper rifle. Hand loaded with improved handling speeds and faster rechamber. 1-shot kill to the head or chest.
Bolt-action sniper rifle. High damage with moderate sway, 1-shot kill to the head, chest or shoulders.
Semi-auto pistol. Good accuracy with a modest ammo capacity. High damage in close range encounters.
Burst fire pistol. Fast cyclic rate of fire with a short delay between bursts. Increased ammo capacity and slightly slower reloading speeds.
Double action revolver. High damage with increased penetration and lower muzzle velocity.
Pump-action shotgun. High damage with a possible 1-shot kill in close quarters. Hand loaded with moderate rechamber speed.
Semi-auto shotgun. Reliable damage and pellet spread. Heavy recoil and low visibility when sustaining fire.
Free-fire rocket launcher. Lock-on capability vs enemy vehicles. Locked rockets travel faster to their targets and maneuver in flight.
Free-fire rocket launcher. Increased blast radius with heavy damage to vehicles, equipment, and personnel. Additional rockets provided.
Lethal melee weapon. Straight-edge blade that kills enemies with a single deadly strike.
Explodes after a short fuse. Can be cooked by holding the grenade key.
High explosive charge that sticks to any surface. Deadly when stuck to vehicles.
Explodes on impact, spreading flames over a small area.
Grenade that sticks to surfaces before detonating.
Disorients enemies and slows movement. Detonates shortly after impact.
Reusable stimulant that initiates healing immediately.
Produces a smoke screen on impact.
Simulates footsteps to confuse enemies.
Throwable mine, explodes shortly after an enemy runs or drives over it. Can be avoided by crouching. Destroys any vehicle that runs over it.\nRecharge time: 2:00
Deploys a recording device that highlights enemy sounds on your minimap.\nRecharge time: 3:15
Destroys thrown enemy equipment and launcher missiles within 10 meter.\nRecharge time: 1:20
Launches missiles at enemy air scorestreaks and player-piloted helicopter.\nRecharge time: 3:45
Proximity activated trap that expels a large cloud of harmful gas. Enemies inside are damaged and disoriented.\nRecharge time: 2:00
Creates an electronic disruption field, disabling enemy Field Upgrades and degrading enemy minimap information.\nRecharge time: 2:30
Detect enemy equipment and Scorestreaks through walls. See enemy Scorestreaks on your minimap. Re-roll Care Packages.
Hear an alert when an enemy aims at you. Your vision pulses if the enemy is outside of your view.
Maximized resistance to Flashbang and Stun Grenade. Immune to gas.
Take less damage from enemy explosives and Molotov and Combat Bow flames.
Replenish ammo from fallen players.

Enemies that appear on your minimap when shooting or revealed by a Spy Plane will have a crosshair indicator instead of a red dot if they are on a killstreak. Recieve extra Score for taking them down.
See imprint of enemy footsteps. Aim at enemies to reveal them on your teams minimap.
Recharge Equipment over 25 seconds.
Fire your weapon and use Equipment while sprinting. Move at full speed when reloading. Switch weapons faster. Take less damage from falling. Fire more accurately while sliding.
Undetectable by enemy Spy Planes whenever you are moving, planting or defusing bombs, or controlling Scorestreaks.
AI-controlled Scorestreaks will not target you. Player-controlled Scorestreaks will not highlight you. Show up cold on Thermal. Players in vehicles wont see your nameplate.
Sprint more quietly. Resistant to Field Mic when sprinting. Speak only when necessary.
Equip extra lethal and tactical equipment. Start with additional ammo.
Equip any weapon class in either slot. Equip multiple perks from one Perk Category.
Unlock 3 qdditional attachment slots for your primary weapon.
Equip an extra Perk from each Perk Category.
Remote controlled car strapped with explosives. Cooldown: 90 sec
Reveal enemy positions through the Fog of War. Cooldown: 90 sec
Scramble enemy mini-maps and disable hostile Missile Turrets for a short time. Cooldown: 60 sec
Deploy a deadly automated turret that targets enemy player, vehicles and equipment. Cooldown: 60 sec
Launch a targeted carpet bomb strike of explosive napalm. Cooldown: 60 sec
Launch three targeted airstrikes. Unused strikes can be saved for later. Cooldown: 60 sec
Call in a squadron of jets to attack enemy air Scorestreaks. Counter enemy Air Patrols. Cooldown: 60 sec
High-explosive grenade launcher. Cooldown: 60 sec
Call in an armed support helicopter. Cooldown: 60 sec
Be the gunner in a close air support helicopter. Cooldown: 60 sec
Lethal
Tactical
Field Upgrade
Perk 1
Perk 2
Perk 3
Wildcards
